statements: UPDATE patient_records SET patient_name = 'Alice', date_of_birth = '1990-05-20' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE patient_records SET lab_results = '{"blood_pressure": {"systolic": 120, "diastolic": 80}}', prescriptions = '["Aspirin", "Vitamin D"]', patient_name = 'Bob' WHERE id = '98765432-0987-7654-3210-123456789011';

UPDATE patient_records SET lab_results = '{"blood_pressure": "120/80", "cholesterol": "200"}', prescriptions = '{"medications": ["Aspirin", "Statins"]}' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE patient_records SET prescriptions = '{"medications": ["Beta Blockers", "Diuretics"]}', lab_results = '{"blood_pressure": "130/85", "cholesterol": "180"}' WHERE id = '654e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
